guide.title: Gentoo Foundation Meeting Minutes
guide.abstract: Here you will find the raw irc logs as well as the secretary's summary information from meetings of the Gentoo Foundation.

body.p: The Gentoo Foundation holds regular meetings via IRC. These are found on irc.freenode.net in #gentoo-trustees. Meetings are currently being held every other Sunday at 19:00 UTC. The next meeting is March 30th.
